passwordError: Password must have at least 6 characters!
acceptAgreeText1: By registering you accept agree to the
step2: Top up your account from 500 inr
rulesText:
To get a free bet, you need to make your first deposit of at least ₹500. The free bet amount is 100% of the amount of your first deposit*. Freebet is provided in the form of one coupon, which can be used to bet on any sporting event.

Funds received from the freebet will be credited to your live account, where you can place bets on the most exciting and interesting events. To withdraw funds earned using the freebet, it’s necessary to fulfill the wagering requirement, which is five times a turnover of the amount of winnings received using the freebet. Wagering is possible only when placing bets on sporting events.

Please note that the administration reserves the right to make changes to any of the clauses of the rules. We always strive to delight our customers with new opportunities and pleasant surprises, and changes are made taking into account your comfort and satisfaction.

*no more than ₹5000.
